bienvenida:
Welcome to SignSpeak

We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.

This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data when using our application.
detalles_recopilacion:
We may collect the following data when you use our app:
• Usage data: Information about how you use the app, such as features used and usage time.
• Camera data: The app may access the camera to interpret sign language. We do not store or share this data.
• Optional data: If you choose to create an account, we may ask for your name, email address, or other necessary data for app functionality.
uso_info: We use the collected information to:
detalles_uso:
• Translate sign language into text or voice in real-time.
• Improve user experience and optimize app functionality.
• Ensure security and prevent misuse of the app.
no_compartimos: We do not sell, rent, or share your information with third parties, except in the following cases:
detalles_no_compartimos:
• Compliance with the law and legal requirements.
• Third-party services needed for the app to function (e.g., cloud storage).
• Our app requests access to the camera to interpret signs in real-time. We do not store images or recordings.
detalles_derechos:
• Access, modify, or delete your personal data.
• Revoke permissions granted to the app (e.g., camera access).
• Contact us with any questions or concerns about your privacy.
• Be notified of important changes through the app or by email (if provided).
correo_contacto: If you have questions about this policy, contact us at:
